21200.「よいところに 来てくれた……。\n すまぬが わしに手を貸してくれ。\n 困っ:
You've come to the right place... but I'm
afraid you'll have to help me. I'm in
trouble...

21201.「見てくれ この杖を……。\n 見た目は似ているが こいつはニセモノ……。\n:
Look at this wand, it looks like it, but it's
a fake, it doesn't speak, it's just a wand.

21202.「本物の杖は…… あの ルナナが持っておる。\n あやつが 杖を奪っていったのじ:
The real Lunana's Staff is in Lunana's Staff.
He took it away from me leaving a fake to
harass me.

21206.「す…すまぬ……。あの杖が なくては……\n わしは…… 思い通りに動けんのだ。:
I'm sorry but without that cane I can't move
as I wish. Even now I can barely speak.

21207.「……ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを倒すため\n わしの杖を 利用しようと……\n:
Lunana's Staff must be thinking of using my
staff to defeat the Magical Beast Byblos.

21208.「あやつは すでに 魔獣ビュブロスの\n 潜んでいる場所を突き止め 向かっている:
He's already tracked down the location of the
Magical Beast Byblos and is on his way... we
must catch up to him at all costs...

21209.「頼む……。その ラニ大洞穴の奥地まで\n わしを 連れていってくれんか……？:
Please... will you take me to the depths of
the Lani Caves...?

21210.「ありがたい。恩に着るぞ……。\n ビュブロスの毒牙に かからぬよう……\n ル:
Thank you. I am indebted to you and I will
protect Lunana and the others from the
poisonous fangs of Byblos.

21211.「わしは おぬしのうしろを ついていく……。\n 道中 何が起こるか…わからんか:
I'll be following behind you because you never
know what might happen along the way. Be
prepared...!

21212.「引き受けてくれるのは ありがたいが……。\n おぬしは…… 他の者の依頼が\n:
I'm glad you're willing to do this but you
seem to have a lot of other people's requests
piling up.

21213.「仕方あるまい……。\n わしは しばらく ここにいるから\n 先に そちらを片:
Well, I'll be here for a while, so why don't
you go and take care of that first...

21214.「……そうか。\n だが わしひとりでは 思うように動けん……。\n 気が変わっ:
I see. But I can't move as fast as I'd like on
my own, so if you change your mind, come back
to me...

21215.「うう……。<pc>か？\n ……すまぬが わしに手を貸してくれ。\n ルナナに:
Ugh... <pc>? I'm sorry, but I need
your help. Lunana's Staff has been stolen...

21216.「あの杖が なくては……\n わしは…… 思い通りに動けぬ……。\n 今も 話し:
Without that cane I would not be able to move
as I wish and even now I can barely speak. I
can barely...

21217.「……ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを倒すため\n わしの杖を 利用しようと……\n:
Lunana's Staff must be thinking of using my
staff to defeat the Magical Beast Byblos.

21218.「あやつは すでに 魔獣ビュブロスの潜んでいる\n ラニ大洞穴に 向かっているは:
It must already be heading for Lani Caves where Magical Beast Byblos is hiding, so we must catch up with it no matter what it
takes...

21219.「ラニ大洞穴は アグラニの北のほら穴を抜け\n すこし 西に行った所にある……。:
The Lani Caves are located a little west of
the north cave of Agrani... take me to its
depths...

21220.「……ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを倒すため\n わしの杖を 奪っていった……。\n:
Lunana's Staff was taken from me in order to
defeat the Magical Beast Byblos without which
I could not move as I wished.

21221.「あやつは すでに 魔獣ビュブロスの潜んでいる\n ラニ大洞穴に 向かっているは:
It must already be heading for Lani Caves where Magical Beast Byblos is hiding, so we must catch up with it no matter what it
takes...

21222.「ラニ大洞穴は アグラニの北のほら穴を抜け\n すこし 西に行った所にある……。:
The Lani Caves are located a little west of
the north cave of Agrani... take me to its
depths...

21223.「わしは おぬしのうしろを ついていく……。\n 道中 何が起こるか…わからんか:
I'll be following behind you because you never
know what might happen along the way. Be
prepared...!

21224.「<pc>よ 頼んだぞ……。\n ビュブロスの毒牙に かからぬよう……\n ルナ:
I ask you, <pc>, to protect Lunana
and her family from the poisonous fangs of
Byblos.

21225.「どうだ <cs_pchero>……。\n ルナナのヤツは いるか……？:
How about <cs_pchero>... is Lunana's guy
there...?

21227.「し…しまった……！\n ルナナと出会う前に ビュブロスが……！\n わしとした:
Oh no! Byblos was here before I met Lunana!
What a terrible thing for me to do...

21228.「ダ…ダメだ…… 身体が……。\n こんなとき…に…… わしは……\n 何も……:
I can't... do... anything... when... my...
body... is... like... this. I can't... do...
anything...

21233.「ま まさか…… おぬし……\n わしが寝ている間に 魔獣ビュブロスを\n 倒し:
Lightning... don't tell me... you defeated
Magical Beast Byblos while I was sleeping...?

21234.「お…おぬしが ここまでやるとは……。\n これならば 残りの １頭も……。:
I'm surprised you've gone this far, but if
this is the case, I'm sure the rest of them
will be...

21239.「真の復讐の のろし……。\n まさか……。: The first sign of true vengeance... no way...

21241.「ちょっと どういうこと！？\n また手柄を 横取りしてくれちゃったワケ！？:
What's going on? Did you just steal all the
credit again?

21242.「ル…ルナナ……。探したぞ……。\n さあ 杖を…返せ……。\n そして…… ビ:
L... Lunana... we've been looking for you...
now give me back my wand... and take Byblos
away from me. ...from Byblos.

21243.「あらあら。いつもの威勢は\n どこに いってしまったのかしら？\n なに言って:
Oh, dear. Where did all your usual bravado go?
I can't hear what you're saying.

21244.「ウフフ……。この杖がないと\n さすがの 大賢者ブロッゲンさまも\n かたなし:
Well... it looks like even the great sage
Broggen's Staff would be without it!

21245.<shake_big>「この小娘ッ！ いいかげんにするのでアール！！\n お前の:
<shake_big>You little bitch! Aru, that's
enough! Aru, you are no match for Byblos in
power!

21246.「さっさと ブロッゲンさまの手に\n ワガハイを 戻すのでアール！！: I will return I to Broggen's hands at once.

21247.「うるっさい 棒ね。\n そう わめかなくても 最後の魔獣を倒したら\n 納屋の:
What a noisy stick. You don't have to rant so
much, I'll make you a stick for the barn after
I kill the last hexenbiest.

21248.「さあ ムチェ ブチャ！ 行くわよ！: Come on, Mutch, Butch! Let's go!

21249.「待て…… ルナナ……。\n お前だけは 行かせん……。\n 行かせては……なら:
Wait... Lunana... you alone cannot go... you
alone cannot go... you alone cannot go...

21253.「クッ……。\n わしは…… 血塗られた運命から\n ルナナを 守ってやれぬのか:
Kut... can't I... protect Lunana from her
bloody fate?

21254.「すまぬ <cs_pchero>よ……。\n アグラニの上の町にある宿屋まで\n:
I'm sorry <cs_pchero> but could you please
escort me to the Inn in the upper Town of
Agrani...

21255.「くわしい話は そこでしよう……。: I'll tell you more about it there...

21256.「おお <pc>……。ご苦労であった……。\n おぬしのおかげで 無事に\n こ:
Oh <pc>... thank you for your
efforts... you have brought us all the way
back here safely...

21257.「外にいるよりは いくぶん 身体が楽だ……。\n ……今こそ ルナナに まつわる:
I feel a little better than I did out there
and now is the time to talk about Lunana's
bloody past. I'd like to talk to you...

21258.「かつて 魔獣ビュブロスたちの親……\n レオン・ビュブロと戦ったとき\n わし:
I was not alone when I fought Leon Byblo, the
father of Magical Beast Byblos.

21259.「そのかたわらには あのルナナの父……\n ホルタ神父が いたのだ……。:
On the other side was Father Holta, Lunana's
father.

21260.「ホルタは…… 面倒見のいい\n アグラニの名士であると同時に\n 呪文の扱いに:
Holta... was not only a caring Agrani master,
but also an excellent priest, skilled in the
use of spells...

21261.「だが その戦いのさなか……\n ホルタは 命を落としてしまった……。\n そし:
But in the heat of battle Holta lost his life
and on his deathbed he said. ...

21262.「娘のルナナが 復讐心に囚われることなく\n 生きていくために……\n はやり病:
He wants us to pretend that his daughter, Lunana, died of a disease so that she can live her life without being consumed by the desire
for vengeance.

21263.「これが あやつの遺言だ……。: This is his last will and testament...

21264.「わしは その遺志を継ぐ者として……\n なんとしてでも ホルタの娘……\n ル:
As heir to his legacy I must protect Holta's
daughter Lunana at all costs.

21265.「……<pc>よ。\n そのためにも おぬしのチカラが必要だ……。\n 時が来た:
...<pc>. For that I need your help...
and when the time comes, I need your help
again...

21266.「ひとまず これは 今回の分の礼だ。\n 受け取ってくれ……。:
For now, this is for this time. Please accept
this...

21267.「わしは ホッツィたちに 協力を求めながら\n ルナナの足取りを 追うことにする:
I'm going to ask Hotzi and the others to help
me track Lunana's steps... and come back here
in a little while...

21268.「次こそ…… 親子二代に渡り\n 魔獣の牙にかかるという 血塗られた運命から\n:
Next time... we will free Lunana from the bloody fate of being trapped under the fangs of a hexenbiest for two generations, father
and son!

29391.「魔獣ビュブロスは アグラニの北のほら穴を抜け\n すこし 西に行った所にある\:
Magical Beast Byblos lurks in a cave called
Lani Caves, a little west of the North Cave of
Agrani...

29987.「グェへへへへ……。もうすぐだ……。\n 長兄の手で 真の復讐の のろしが\n:
Guhehehehehehe... it will soon be time... for
true vengeance to be unleashed by the hands of
my eldest brother...

29988.「オレらは おとりに過ぎねえ……。\n 父のカタキ…… 必ず とってみせる……。:
We're just a decoy to get my father's body and
I'm going to get it, Sage Broggen... Prepare
yourselves.
